name: Far Cry 3
utterance: I thought Far Cry 3 was pretty good. I have a thing for first person open world games and the action element of it was exciting.

name: Far Cry 3
utterance: I love action-adventure games and this was a good one that scratched my itch. I'd recommend that anyone interested in the series start out with Far Cry 3.

name: Far Cry 3
utterance: Far Cry 3 was a good game that started off a new era. Since it came out, the Playstation has had a lot of interesting and expanding games in the genre, including its sequels.

name: Far Cry 3
utterance: One thing I thought that makes Far Cry 3 a pretty good game is that it has multiplayer as well. It has a great single player campaign, but you can also jump online and enjoy it as well.

name: Far Cry 3
utterance: Far Cry 3 was a pretty good game for 2012 because it made mainstream the open world genre in more action oriented games. It spawned a lot of like-minded games that made the genre grow.
